text: Bad Boyz is a 2024 Indian Malayalam-language drama movie written and directed by Omar Lulu. Made under Abaam Movies, it stars Rahman, Bibin George and Sheelu Abraham. The film was theatrically released on 13 September 2024. == Cast == * Rahman * Bibin George * Sheelu Abraham == Production == The film was announced in May 2024. Principal photography was wrapped in July 2024. The film teaser was released on 24 August 2024, followed by the trailer on 4 September 2024. == Reception == A critic from Malayala Manorama and Mathrubhumi reviewed the film. Rohit Panikker of Times Now gave the film stars out of 5 stars. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2024 drama movies Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Bad Boyz
